overview:
Rudra specializes in the domain of security and regularly writes on various information security related topics in reputed international magazines like Hakin9, Infosecurity Mag and several others. He was part of the team which drafted the Security Implementation Framework of Nasscom Data Security Council of India aimed at compliance for all IT/ITES companies as per India IT Act 2000.

Rudra manages product strategy and management at iViZ Security - The world’s first On Demand Penetration testing company. He has a strong experience in cloud security, penetration testing and compliance. He has managed over 70+ audits and has helped several global organizations with their information security practice including consulting, certifications like PCI DSS and ISO 27001. He has also founded OWASPâ€™s Kolkata chapter in 2005 and has organized many AppSec awareness campaigns, boot camps and hack events.
